name: 2023 International Conference on Advances in Biomedicine and Biomedical Engineering
content:
Dear Friends and Colleagues, 
 
 On behalf of the Organizing Committee, we are delighted to invite you to participate in the [**2023 International Conference on Advances in Biomedicine and Biomedical Engineering (ICABBE 2023)**](https://icabbe.apaset.edu.pl/), to be held virtual online. Conference website: <https://icabbe.apaset.edu.pl/> 
 
 The field of biomedicine and biomedical engineering has been rapidly evolving in recent years, with many exciting breakthroughs and discoveries being made. The aim of this conference is to bring together experts from around the world to discuss the latest trends, exchange ideas, and explore new research directions. This conference is dedicated to providing a platform for researchers, scholars, and industry professionals to share their latest findings and advancements in the fields of biomedicine and biomedical engineering. 
 
 The scope of the conference is broad and includes topics such as biomedical imaging, bioinformatics, biomaterials, tissue engineering, drug discovery, and regenerative medicine, among others. 
 The call for papers is now open, and we invite submissions from researchers and professionals in academia, industry, and government. Accepted abstracts will be presented in either oral or poster sessions, and we encourage authors to submit their work early to ensure consideration for presentation. 
 
 The conference will feature a variety of sessions and presentations, including keynote speeches from leading experts in the field, panel discussions, and technical sessions. Attendees will have the opportunity to network with other professionals and learn about the latest developments in biomedicine and biomedical engineering. 
 
 We look forward to welcoming you to the International Conference on Advances in Biomedicine and Biomedical Engineering and hope that you will join us in contributing to the advancement of these exciting fields. 
 
 Best regards 
 
**ICABBE 2023 Organizing Committee** 
**Email**: icabbe@apaset.org; icabbe@apaset.edu.pl 
**Website**: <https://icabbe.apaset.edu.pl/>
organizers: Asia-Pacific Association of Science Engineering and Technology
